title: Left click not working anymore
body:
Ever since the update for the new client rolled out my left click had been automatically set to attack move (i have never manually set it to that before) and it led to my left click becoming redundant as it could only attack move, thus i could not click on shop items or ping etc. I tried clicking reset to default but that just removed the attack move from the left click, leaving the left click to be completely useless. I have previously tried suggestions of deleting config files but it has not fixed the problem.

Could anyone help me with a solution to this?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try the following to reset your configuration to default. (Please follow these steps exactly)

* Login to the client (which syncs your settings with the server)
* Go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
* Delete the "PersistedSettings.json", "game.cfg" & "input.ini" files.
* Launch a custom game
* Exit the custom game
* Exit the client
It's working fine now! Thank you very much :)
